ibanez.jacob.cat.xtec.ioc.lectorrss.repository

Class RssItemRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • ibanez.jacob.cat.xtec.ioc.lectorrss.repository.RssItemRepository

  • public class RssItemRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for manipulating RssItem objects from the database.

    It encapsulates all access to the database, so it manages creating and closing connections itself.

    Author:
    Jacob Ibáñez Sánchez.

        public RssItemRepository(android.content.Context context)

    • Method Detail

      • insertItem

        public long insertItem(RssItem item)
        Creates a new RssItem in the database.

        If the item already exists, it does nothing

        Parameters:
        item - The item to create
        Returns:
        The number of rows affected or -1 if an error occurs

      • existsByTitle

        public boolean existsByTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Checks if a RssItem already exists, searching by its RssItem.title
        Parameters:
        title - The RssItem.title
        Returns:
        true if the item exists in the database. false otherwise.

      • getAllItems

        public java.util.List<RssItem> getAllItems(java.lang.String keyword)
        This method retrieve all elements from the database, with an optional keyword.

        If the keyword is informed, it searches any coincidence in the RssItem.title with the given keyword passed as parameter, not only exact matches.

        Parameters:
        keyword - The keyword to look up after
        Returns:
        A collection of RssItems, matching criteria if any, or all items if there's no keyword
